definition: a golden house to keep one's mistress (idiom); a magnificent house built for a beloved woman
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
lit. the red apricot tree leans over the garden wall (idiom)/fig. a wife having an illicit lover
lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
lit. the happy fate of the man from Qi (who had a wife and a concubine) (idiom)/fig. (ironically) the joy of having several partners/the life of a pasha
to fondle the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
lit. stolen scent, pilfered jade (idiom); philandering/secret illicit sex
(of a married woman) to stay home alone
to carry on a clandestine love affair
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
